product.name: CLOUDY BAY 5CCT 3 Light Directional Ceiling Spotlight,Dimmable LED Track Light Heads,CRI90+,2100Lm for Hallway Kitchen Art,White
product.description:
2700K/3000K is warm ,cozy and relaxing, ideal for bedroom, hallway, coffee shop and clothing store
3500/4000K gives a neutral glow, suitable for living room, kitchen and other areas
5000K is bright and clear, widely used in study, workshop, gallery, jewelry store or other place where to show details
product.bullet_points:
• 2700K/3000K /3500K/4000K/5000K in one fixture,20W LED track light equivalent to 3*50W halogen. Integrated with COB（chip on board), not bulb replaceable
• 3 pivoting track heads direct and focus light where needed(90° rotatable of the light head and 330° rotatable of the main bracket)
• Dimming smoothly from 10% - 100%, flicker-free.Compatible with most Leviton and Lutron dimmers(Please refer to the dimmer list)
• Perfect for dinning room,living room,bedroom,hallway,entryway,foyer,office and more
• 3-year warranty assures the rated 25,000 lifetime (average 3-5 hours/day).Contact us for an easy and fast replacement.
